label: KnowledgeSourceIngestionParameters
description: Consolidates all general ingestion settings for knowledge sources.

fields.label: AI Services
fields.tooltip: Optional AI Services configuration for content processing.

fields.label: Chat Completion Model
fields.tooltip: Optional chat completion model for image verbalization or context extraction.

fields.label: Content Extraction Mode
fields.tooltip: Optional content extraction mode. Default is 'minimal'.

fields.label: Disable Image Verbalization
fields.tooltip: Indicates whether image verbalization should be disabled. Default is false.

fields.label: Embedding Model
fields.tooltip: Optional vectorizer configuration for vectorizing content.

fields.label: Identity
fields.tooltip: An explicit identity to use for this knowledge source.

fields.label: Ingestion Permission Options
fields.tooltip: Optional list of permission types to ingest together with document content.
